rule.name: AS_FS_BL_sortOnboardingsRequestForDisplay
rule.description: Sort the onboarding requests to display - active onboardings first and then by recent funding date
rule.definition: a!localVariables( local!activeOnboardings: #"_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_75720"( cdt: #"_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_271202"( cdt: ri!onboardings, field: "isOpen", value: false ), field: "dateField.value", ascending: true ), local!inActiveOnboardings: #"_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_75720"( cdt: #"_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_271202"( cdt: ri!onboardings, field: "isOpen", value: true ), field: "dateField.value", ascending: true ), { local!activeOnboardings, local!inActiveOnboardings } )
